name: Skávo
description:
Take on the role of an archaeologist as you carefully unearth precious Greek Artifacts in this short retro styled game. Dig them up, brush them off, and aim to see your name among the pantheon of High Scorers!

This game was made for the 3 Day Extra Credits Game Jam #6. Built off the theme of "Take care", along with an additional 4 colour palette challenge based off the old CGA Graphics Card, and a slight dab of historical theming.

Also if you've made it this far, why not post your highest score in the comments below? The highest we've seen so far internally is 395, good luck to anyone who thinks they can beat it!
